data.play-online#Play Online: If you just want to play around with NEXT UI without setting up a project, you can use one of our online sandboxes:
data.automatic-installation#Automatic Install:
Using the CLI is the easiest way to start a NEXT UI project. You can initialize your project directly via the CLI:
npx @next-design-labs/next-ui-cli@latest create
data.manual-installation#Manual Installation: If you prefer not to use the CLI, follow these steps to manually set up NEXT UI in your project:
data.install-packages#Install packages:
To use NEXT UI in your project, run the following command:
react and react-dom are peer dependencies and must be included in your project.
npm install @next-design-labs/next-ui-core @mui/base

data: NEXT UI is an open source UI library from NEXT Design Labs designed to streamline the development of high-quality digital products.It offers a collection of highly customizable, accessible modern react components built on top of BaseUI and UnoCss.
data.why-next-ui#Why NEXT UI: When it comes to customization, NEXT UI stands out as a highly flexible option within the realm of React UI Kits. Hereâ€™s a deeper dive into its customization strengths:
data.1-component-part-variants#1. Component P: NEXT UI offers more than just pre-built components. It provides the ability to customize individual parts within each component using variants. Each part can be customized independently, giving you the flexibility to create highly tailored user interfaces.
data.2-theme-customization#2. Theme Customiza: NEXT UI allows you to tailor the overall theme by using data attributes. This method simplifies the process of adjusting various properties such as palette colors, border radius values, background and border shades, and shadows.
data.3-css-variables#3. Css Variables: While theming is based on data attributes, you can also use CSS Variables to customize your theme. With component part variants, data attributes, thoughtful design choices, and CSS variables, you can achieve a high level of design control without sacrificing development speed.
data.how-is-next-ui-different-from-other-ui-l:
NEXT UI takes customization a step further:
Built in Palette colors : Comes with built-in palettes that leverage familiar Tailwind CSS defaults, making it easier to quickly start building your UI.
Multi theming support : Empowers you to create multi-themed applications with ease.
Component part variants : Components offer granular customization through part variants.
Data attributes : Empowers you to customize themes with ease using data attributes. This approach simplifies adjusting various properties for both the entire application and individual components.
NEXT UI empowers you to achieve a truly unique and tailored user interface through its superior customization features.
